column1: Great Food, great service, Great atmosphere.... Highly Recommend... P.S Be sure to save room for a chocolate flower pot dessert. you will love it!!
Great place to visit, highly recommended. For 2000.00 pesos we got a 3 hour excursion with 2 guides and snorkeling gear. A deal you can only get with a local bo...
Staff was Great once we were there!! Nice Facilities, well trained Dolphins , but, it was a challenge to get a good price... Americans will be charged much more...
